Reach Out to the Boca Burger Battle Team
Got questions about tickets, event details, sponsorships, media inquiries, competing as a battle contender, sampling beer, wine, spirits or being a retail or commercial vendor? We’re here to help! Reach out to us via phone or email.

Beyond The Burger: Next On The Menu in 2025 and 2026
Upcoming South Florida Festivals – Florida Festivals Near Me – Experience the Best Events in Boca Raton – Snag your pre-sale discount tickets today and join the flavor movement! Check out these two
Boca Raton Events
below.
The 12th Annual
Boca Raton Wine and Food Festival
,
A Culinary Affair!
will take place inside Sanborn Square Park in downtown Boca Raton on
Saturday, November 8th, 2025
. South Florida Festival Tickets are on Sale!
BocaRatonWineandFoodFestival.com/Tickets
The 3rd Annual
Florida Tacos, Wings & Desserts Battle
,
A Fiesta, Blazing, and Sweet Affair!
takes place inside Sanborn Square Park in downtown Boca Raton on
Saturday, April 25, 2026
. Discount Tickets now available!
FloridaWingBattle.com/Tickets

Join us for the
12th Annual Boca Burger Battle – A Grilling Affair!
, happening on
Saturday, July 12, 2025
, in Boca Raton. Your
ticket includes unlimited
burgers, bites, craft drinks, and live entertainment at Florida’s ultimate burger festival.

BOCA BURGER BATTLE TICKETS OFFER UNLIMITED:
* BURGERS * BITES! * CRAFT BEERS * SUMMER WINES * SEASONAL SPIRITS * LIVE ENTERTAINMENT
* VOTE PEOPLE'S CHOICE FOR "BEST BATTLE BURGER" *
FAQ's About What Your Boca Burger Battle Tickets Include
Q: What is included with my Boca Burger Battle Tickets?
A: Your Boca Raton event ticket includes unlimited Burger Tastings, Bites!, Craft Beer, Wine, Spirits, and Live Music. There are no additional food or beverage fees at the event.
Q: Is the Boca Burger Battle a 21+ event?
A: Yes, all guests must be 21 or over with a valid ID to attend.
Q: Is this event rain or shine?
A: Yes, the Boca Burger Battle is a rain or shine event. No refunds or exchanges will be issued.
Q: Will there be items available for purchase?
A: Yes! The Retail Shopping Bazaar will feature products for sale. Be sure to bring extra cash to shop.
Q: Can I bring my pet?
A: No, pets are not allowed at the event for safety reasons.
Q: Are there any restrictions on bags?
A: Yes, no large purses or backpacks are allowed inside. All bags are subject to search upon entry.
Q: Are weapons or smoking allowed?
A: No firearms, weapons, or smoking are allowed inside Sanborn Square Park.
Q: Can I purchase tickets by phone?
A: Yes! Group tickets can be ordered by calling 561.338.7594 from 9 AM to 9 PM, 7 days a week.
Q: Who is the nonprofit partner?
A: The Boca Burger Battle supports the Children’s Giving Foundation, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit based in Boca Raton.
Q: Can I be photographed or filmed at the event?
A: Yes, your image may be captured in photos or videos for future event marketing.
Q: Is there a message about alcohol consumption?
A: Yes, we urge all adults to consume alcoholic beverages responsibly
